properties.Title: Exploring Transport Planning in Colombia
properties.Subtitle: Project Engineer
properties.Description: Development of transport models, by exploratory, and econometric methods, data analyst and modeler. Support experts in the diligence in all phases of projects with public customers, in Bogota and other cities of Latino America. Aligned to sustainable mobility, public transport, pedestrian and bike infrastructure. Document bids applications and support the technical chapters.
properties.More_Info: Stakeholder reporting on sustainable mobility, road safety audits, micro-mobility, road design assessments and infrastructure. Document and contract management, QA/QC. Data and geographic analysis for private and public transportation networks.

properties.Title: Unveiling the Dynamics of VC and Innovation in Europe
properties.Subtitle: Operations and Research Associate
properties.Description: Researched innovative technologies, partnerships, and opinion leaders in the EU, with a focus on energy storage systems, digital twins, and urban air mobility. Assisted in improving office work process standards. Developed a database tool for managing start-ups.
properties.More_Info: Research on innovative technologies, partnerships, and opinion leaders in the EU (Energy Storage systems, Digital Twins, Urban Air Mobility). Assistance in improving office work process standards. Elaborate a database tool for the management of Start-Ups.

properties.Title: International Cooperation in Sustainable Mobility Initiatives
properties.Subtitle: Sustainable Mobility officer
properties.Description: Implementation of pilot projects in the digitalization of mobility and freight transport in the global south. Research and forecast on innovation and future mobility in freight transport and data for policy making worldwide. Facilitate and coordinate good communication between multilateral partners. Initiate and maintain communication with project stakeholders.

properties.Title: Pursuing Civil Engineering in Bogotá
properties.Subtitle: Civil Engineering Student
properties.Description: Taught modules in road design and project management for 2 years. Focused on optimizing space and promoting sustainable mobility in Bogota. Developed projects to improve student relations and campus leadership skills in multidisciplinary working environments.
properties.More_Info: Taught modules in road design and project management for two years, with a research focus on optimizing public space and promoting sustainable mobility. Developed initiatives to improve student relations and encourage campus leadership in multidisciplinary work environments.

properties.Title: AI Asset Integration for Mobility, Smart Spaces, and Cybersecurity
properties.Subtitle: WM - Project Assistant
properties.Description: Management of office assets and activities for autonomous mobility, Smart spaces, and cybersecurity. Keep updated the documentation of BeIntelli project for the use of AI in urban mobility. Ease and coordinate the communication between multilateral partners from investors, researchers, and students.
properties.More_Info: Supported the establishment of the ZEKI Space (Center for Tangible Artificial Intelligence and Digitalization). Maintained and updated documentation for the BeIntelli project, focusing on the use of AI in urban mobility. Facilitated and coordinated communication between multilateral partners from private and public entities, organizing networking events.

properties.Title: Mastering Sustainable Mobility Management in Berlin
properties.Subtitle: MBA Student
properties.Description: Focus on the study of project planning, design and management of intelligent mobility networks. Dissertation on the scale-up of mobility hubs, challenges of public-private partnerships, funding schemes and implementation. Involvement in extracurricular activities such as a mobility club, participation in various hackathons, and volunteering in international networks for sustainable transport and urban development.
properties.More_Info: Focused on the study of project planning, design, and management of intelligent mobility networks. Completed a dissertation on the scale-up of mobility hubs, addressing challenges in public-private partnerships, funding schemes, and implementation. Active involvement in extracurricular activities, including a mobility club, participation in various hackathons, and volunteering with international networks for sustainable transport and urban development.

properties.Title: Modeling and Designing Future Transit and Mobility Solutions
properties.Subtitle: Traffic Engineering
properties.Description: Design public transport and sustainable mobility operations in Bogota. Lead and coordinate reporting of project procurement to clients from public and private sectors. Communicate and network with external partners and customers.
properties.More_Info: Designed public transport and sustainable mobility operations in Bogotá. Led and coordinated reporting on project procurement for clients in both public and private sectors. Facilitated communication and networking with external partners and customers.

properties.Title: Mapping the Journey of Cargo Bikes in Germany
properties.Subtitle: Research support
properties.Description: Reviewed and forecast logistics concepts, reporting multivariable analysis for cargo bike projects in Germany. Report and sample geographic information base in exploratory research, for logistics and urban development, predicting e-commerce and courier resilience. Study novel cargo bike concepts for medium and small businesses in Germany.
properties.More_Info: Analyzed economic and logistic concepts for freight transport in Germany. Conducted reporting and sampling of geographic and network information for exploratory research in logistics and urban development. Evaluated novel solutions for urban freight in districts across Berlin.
